i1.name: The Relentless Storm
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Volibear''' gains a [[stack]] of ''The Relentless Storm'' whenever he damages at least one enemy with a {{tip|basic attack}} [[on-hit]] or [[champion ability|ability]], stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities. At 5 stacks, '''Volibear''' gains ''Lightning Claws''.
{{sbc|The Relentless Storm:}} '''Volibear''' gains {{sti|{{as|5% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} per stack, up to {{as|25% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.

{{sbc|Lightning Claws:}} '''Volibear's''' claws ignite with lightning, causing his [[basic attack]]s [[on-hit]] to deal {{as|{{pp|10+1*x for 3; then + 2*x for 3; then + 3*x for 7; then + 4*x|formula=10+1 per level until lvl 3, then+2 until lvl 6, then+3 per level until lvl 13, then+4 per level}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} to the target and the closest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.
i1.notes:
* '''Volibear's''' spikes visually grow as ''The Relentless Storm'' stacks.
* ''Lightning Claws'' has no effect on [[structures]] and {{tip|ward|wards}}.
* While at four stacks, the next attack or ability on-hit reaching the fifth stack will be empowered by ''Lightning Claws''.
* A stack of ''The Relentless Storm'' is not gained if the attack is {{tip|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. A stack is granted even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}}. In all cases, ''Lightning Claws'' will not apply (on-hit damage is parried and the bounce is prevented).
** Since {{ai|Frenzied Maul|Volibear}} cannot be missed while '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, gaining stacks from ''The Relentless Storm'' and applying ''Lighting Claws'' from the ability will not be prevented from that parry effect.
* '''Volibear''' has a hidden passive that grants him {{as|1 armor}} for every enemy {{ci|Zilean}} within 800 range of him.
** Likewise, {{ci|Zilean}} gains {{as|1 ability power}} for every nearby '''Volibear'''.
** Neither '''Volibear''' nor {{ci|Zilean}} need {{tip|sight}} of one another to gain these bonuses.

q1.name: Thundering Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' drops on all fours, becoming {{tip|ghosting|ghosted}} and gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 4 seconds, doubled when moving towards {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champions}}.

While active, '''Volibear's''' next basic attack within the duration becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, {{tt|{{tip|dash|pounces}} on the target|to 25 to 150 units closer than attack range, if Volibear is not closer already}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and {{tip|stun|stuns}} the target for 1 second.
If '''Volibear''' becomes {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an enemy while ''Thundering Smash'' is active, the effect ends prematurely and the ability's {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.
''Thundering Smash'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Volibear's''' basic attack timer, benefits from {{stil|life steal}} and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 26}}%|Increased Movement Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 26*2}}%}}
q1.notes:
* ''Thundering Smash's'' empowered attack scales with '''Volibear's''' {{sti|{{as|attack speed}}}}.
* Unlike most spells that empower a basic attack, ''Thundering Smash'' does '''not''' have an increased {{sti|range|attack range}}.
* ''Thundering Smash'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* ''Thundering Smash'' will still apply its effects to the target even if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, but not if he goes into {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Thundering Smash'' can {{tip|dash}} over walls provided '''Volibear''' is in attack range of his target on the other side.
* ''Thundering Smash's'' attack triggers against {{tip|turret|structures}} and {{tip|wards}}, consuming the effect but dealing its bonus damage, if applicable.
* The windup for the attack completes even if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} but the {{tip|stun}} and damage do not apply.
* ''Thundering Smash's'' reset does not trigger from {{tip|drowsy}} and is only granted after falling {{tip|sleep|asleep}}.
* The [[Summoner|player's]] screen will flash red briefly and cue a sound effect when '''Volibear''' becomes {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} while ''Thundering Smash'' is active.
* '''Volibear's''' next attack after using ''Thundering Smash'' will come out faster.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 26}}%|Increased Movement Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 26*2}}%}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: %
  • Increased Movement Speed: %

w1.name: Frenzied Maul
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' strikes the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, applying {{tip|on-hit}} and [[on-attack]] effects, and ''Wounding'' them for 8 seconds.

Against a ''Wounded'' enemy, '''Volibear''' instead bites the target, dealing [[File:Critical strike icon.png|20px]] {{tt|50% increased damage|cosmetic critical strike}}, and {{tip|healing}} himself. The heal is halved against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 110}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 6% of his '''bonus''' health)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|10*1.5 to 110*1.5}} {{as|(+ 150% AD)}} {{as|(+ 9% of his '''bonus''' health)}}}}
{{st|Champion Heal|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ {{ap|8 to 16}}% of his '''missing''' health)}}|Non-Champion Heal|{{ap|10 to 40}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4 to 8}}% of his '''missing''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Volibear''' will be ordered to [[basic attack]] the target after casting ''Frenzied Maul''.
* ''Frenzied Maul'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* The empowered version of ''Frenzied Maul'' has a [[File:Critical_strike_icon.png|20px|link=]] [[Critical_strike#Cosmetic_critical_strikes|cosmetic critical strike]].
* ''Frenzied Maul's'' bite {{tip|heals}} even if it is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* ''Frenzied Maul's'' strike can be {{tip|dodged}} and {{tip|blocked}}, but it cannot miss if '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. The ''Wound'' is applied regardless.
** The bite can be {{tip|blocked}} but '''Volibear''' still heals. It does not heal nor deal damage if the bite is {{tip|dodged}}. The bite cannot miss if '''Volibear''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or '''Volibear''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Frenzied Maul'' does not deal damage nor apply the mark but its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are refunded.
* ''Frenzied Maul'' deals bonus damage and heals if the target is still ''Wounded'' after the cast time. If the mark wares off before the cast time completes, the ability's animation will appear as if the bite was applied but there is no bonus damage or heal.

e1.name: Sky Splitter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. Enemies can see the cast location indicator after a 1-second delay. If '''Volibear''' is within the lightning strike, he {{tip|shields}} himself for {{as|15% of his '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} for 3 seconds.
The lightning bolt deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck, capped against non-champions, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area for 1 second.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 200}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|11 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Capped Damage|{{ap|150 to 550}}}}
e1.notes:
* Enemies cannot see the location of the cast for the first second, but they can already tell that the spell is underway by noticing '''Volibear's''' cast animation.
* '''Volibear''' will receive the {{tip|shield}} even if he is {{tip|untargetable}}.

r1.name: Stormbringer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' gains ''Stormbringer'' for 12 seconds and {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location with {{tip|cc-immune|immunity to crowd control}} as well as granting {{tip|sight}} of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.

{{sbc|Stormbringer:}} '''Volibear''' becomes {{tip|ghosted|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, {{sti|50 '''bonus''' attack range}}, 25 increased range on {{ai|Frenzied Maul|Volibear}}, and 35% increased [[size]].

'''Volibear''' {{tt|impacts|centered on Volibear's location when the dash ends in any way}} after 1 second, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies in an area by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt {{as|physical damage}}.

'''Volibear''' also disables enemy {{tip|turrets}} (including {{tip|untargetable}} ones and those in {{tip|stasis}}, excluding {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}) in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same {{as|physical damage}}.{{tt|*|All untargetable turrets are invulnerable to damage (exception: Practice Tool)}}
''Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that. {{ais|Thundering Smash|Volibear}} duration will be paused for the {{tip|dash|leap}}.''
r1.notes:
* '''Volibear''' grows to his new size over {{fd|1.25}} seconds, starting {{fd|0.25}} seconds after landing, and shrinks back to his normal size over {{fd|0.5}} seconds after ''Stormbinger's'' status ends, respectively.
* '''Volibear''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} over 1 second regardless of distance or {{stil|movement speed}}.
** '''Volibear''' impacts immediately at his current location if ''Stormbringer'' is cast over terrain he cannot pass through (due to not being able to cover the distance required).{{bug}}
* The damage of ''Stormbringer'' has a [[File:Critical_strike_icon.png|20px|link=]] [[Critical_strike#Cosmetic_critical_strikes|cosmetic critical strike]].
* The additional bonuses are granted on-cast.
* The turret disable debuff is named ''Ohmwrecker''.
* Disabling a {{tip|turret}} does not prevent aggro of the current target it is locked onto. The increased turret shot damage from {{ii|Ohmwrecker (Turret Item)|Ohmwrecker}} is also reset.
** Turrets maintain the same targeting behavior even when disabled; damaging an enemy champion will still draw turret aggro. However, if the turret's desired target leaves range or has become an invalid target, it will lock onto the most previous target it was going to attack prior to becoming disabled, or instead, find a new one if that condition is not applicable.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Volibear''' is dashing:
{{ct|dash|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death}}

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 250% bonus AD) (+ 125% AP)
